programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: The Takeover
programme.desc: Cédric works in a company specialized in precision mechanics. Its management, run by an investment fund, is disastrous. As another fund is about to buy it again, Cédric decides to take the company over, giving it to the employees.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: Snow
programme.desc: In the heart of winter, several notables are found murdered. To advance investigations, Captain Delhaye decides to bring Juliette Hémon out of prison for a few days. The young woman had been imprisoned some years earlier for a strangely similar case.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: Manta Manta: Legacy
programme.desc: Ex-racer Bertie is facing financial issues with his car repair shop and go-kart track. He plans to participate in an upcoming 90’s race to solve his money problems, but he is suddenly asked by his ex-wife to take care of their son.

programme.title: East Frisian: Fire
programme.desc: Detectives Klaasen and Weller's are finally getting married. But their honeymoon is cut short when a corpse is found in bonfire ashes. As bodies pile up, they chase a serial killer through a town celebrating Easter, unraveling a dark mystery.

programme.title: Celeste
programme.desc: Living in the lush rainforest of Northern Queensland, a retired opera diva prepares for one final performance. Her late husband's son Jack arrives, haunted by the past, only to discover that Celeste has one last request for him.

programme.title: Abu Omar
programme.desc: Under a strict military curfew Salah, a grieving father, sets out on the road to cross the Israeli border carrying his dead son Omar in a duffel bag. Miri, a pregnant single woman, decides to help him out at all costs while fending off the terrible heat.

programme.title: Golden Men
programme.desc: Based on a true story. A star-studded heist film with a comedic edge, Golden Men follows a group of desperate men in Turin who attempt an armoured truck robbery.

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess (OTO)
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: Ka Benjie
programme.desc: The quiet life of the dreamer Ka Benjie was shattered when he heard of the enrollment in the other village.

programme.title: East Frisian: Moor
programme.desc: Frank Weller's perfect proposal plans are derailed as he and Inspector Ann Kathrin Klaasen delve into a gruesome case. The couple must solve a case involving a poorly concealed body in Uplengen Moor and a kidnapping of twins in the city center.
